Keywords: Cosmic
Real Name: Clyde Wyncham Jr.
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
WE WERE JUST HAVING FUN... BEFORE WE TAKE IT ALL AWAY: Each time an opposing character heals, give Marquis of Death a False Hope token. // Pulse Wave. When Marquis of Death uses it, you may remove any number of False Hope tokens. If you do, each hit character is dealt X damage instead where X is the number of tokens removed.
SHAPE REALITY TO MY OWN VISION: Energy Explosion. When Marquis of Death uses it, for each hit target you may choose that they are healed 1 click instead of being dealt damage.
YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND THE FORCES YOU TOY WITH: STOP. Invincible.

Comments
October 28, 2021
Redrover454
Marquis isn't the most meta piece out there, but she is arguably one of the most efficient and versatile Clix in modern rn. Awesome, diverse powerset (offensively and defensive), great combat values, Cosmic Energy, and with all the healing in the game rn, her FALSE HOPE tokens will be useful more than you might think, ESPECIALLY after the release of R&F. Slap just about any equipment in the game on her and for 65-70 pts you have yourself a click that never won't be useful.
April 11, 2021

And that's replacement instead of modify, so no rule of 3, right? That will seriously penalize an opponent that plays Hox Wolverine or the FF TA, among others.

bam
After the rules change to Pulse Wave.. this dial likely became the better option in terms of team offensive output. He just won't have 3 stop clicks.
